tool_description: Converts images between different formats while preserving quality and optimizing for web delivery.

asset_id.description: Asset identifier of the image to convert

target_format.description: Target image format: jpeg, png, webp, or avif

converted_asset_id.description: New asset ID for the converted image

original_size.description: Size of original file in bytes

converted_size.description: Size of converted file in bytes
